responses.s0_q0: Partially: There is a privacy policy, but it is outdated or not fully comprehensive.
responses.s0_q1: Partially: Some, but not all, elements are addressed.
responses.s0_q2: Yes: The policy is always available free of charge in a suitable format.
responses.s0_q3: No: The organization does not provide the policy in different formats.
responses.s1_q0: No: The organization does not allow anonymous or pseudonymous interactions.
responses.s1_q1: Yes: Exceptions are only made when legally required or impracticable.
responses.s2_q0: No: Information is collected regardless of necessity.
responses.s2_q1: Yes: Sensitive information is collected only with consent or as legally permitted.
responses.s2_q2: Partially: Collection is usually lawful and fair, but not always.
responses.s2_q3: No: Information is regularly collected from third parties without valid exceptions.
responses.s3_q0: Yes: All unsolicited information is assessed for compliance with collection principles.
responses.s3_q1: Yes: Unnecessary unsolicited information is promptly destroyed or de-identified.
responses.s4_q0: Yes: Individuals are always notified of all required matters.
responses.s5_q0: Partially: Use/disclosure for secondary purposes occurs without proper basis.
responses.s5_q1: Yes: Secondary use/disclosure is always related and reasonably expected.
responses.s5_q2: No: Guidelines are not followed or not relevant.
responses.s6_q0: Partially: Direct marketing occurs without proper consent or authority.
